Resty Nanteza bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na redio NBS na obodo Jinja nke onye bụbu onye omeiwu Hon Igeme Nathan Nabeta

N'afọ 2021, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Buikwe na ntuli aka zuru oke nke Uganda n'afọ 2021, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke Nyenga Division. O jisiri ike nweta vootu 41,561, a kọkwara na ọ meriri na ụfọdụ ndepụta mbụ nke nsonaazụ. Otú ọ dị, Diana Mutasingwa (NRM) meriri ya bụ onye meriri ntuli aka ahụ na 43,215 vootu. Nanteza gbara nsonaazụ ahụ aka n'ụlọ ikpe.
Ọ bụ onye otu Forum for Democratic Change
